name: Ezhava Matrimony - Free Matrimony App for Ezhavas
description: EzhavaMatrimony is the exclusive and most trusted matrimony service for Ezhavas across the world. You can choose Ezhava bride and groom profiles from major cities across Kerala in India, and other NRIs. Thousands of Ezhavas have successfully found their life partner here, and you too can find your Perfect Match now. 100% Safe and Secure App. Register FREE.  Ezhava Matrimony App is a part of CommunityMatrimony, which has over 150 top community matrimonial apps including, NairMatrimony, VishwakarmaMatrimony, VanniyarMatrimony, NadarMatrimony, MudaliyarMatrimony, LingayathMatrimony, VokkaligaMatrimony, BrahminMatrimony, and more.  Heres what you can do after downloading the Free Ezhava Matrimony App:  - Create your profile and set up your partner preferences based on age, location, education, and community. - See daily matches on mobile and email. - View profiles and photos of your matches. - View your nearby matches based on location. - Discover matches based on interests like profession, education, star, age, and location. - Express interest to your prospects. - Respond to messages from other members.  Thousands of registered members from all major Ezhava community sub-castes such as Ezhava, Thiyya, Thandan, Panicker, Kavuthiya, and many more are available.  EzhavaMatrimony has members from major cities in Kerala like Thiruvananthapuram, Kollam, Alappuzha, Ernakulam, Kottayam, Thrissur, Palakkad, Pathanamthitta, Kozhikode, Idukki, Kannur, Malappuram, and other Indian cities like Bangalore, Chennai, Coimbatore, Mumbai, and Delhi. Also, we do have profiles of Ezhava NRIs from USA, UAE, Singapore, Australia, Kuwait, Oman, UK, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Malaysia, and Canada.  You can find brides and grooms from different Professions, Educational Backgrounds, Locations, and Sub Castes. Our member base of Kerala Ezhava aims to provide you with the best possible match to find the love of your life. Download the app today and find your life partner!  A Premium Membership can provide you with additional benefits: - You can contact your prospects through mobile, SMS, email and chat - You can send personalized messages to members you like - Get Premium Tag and be featured in the premium members section - Get priority position in search results and better response for your profile  CommunityMatrimony, of which EzhavaMatrimony is a part, belongs to the Matrimony.com group, the No. 1 matrimony service for Indians worldwide, which pioneered online matchmaking in India 20 years ago. Matrimony.com is a public listed company that owns over 300 of Indias largest matrimony brands including, KeralaMatrimony, TamilMatrimony, KannadaMatrimony, and EliteMatrimony. It has a considerable retail presence with over 130 self-owned retail outlets across India. It also has a significant international presence with offices in the USA and Dubai. Matrimony.com has over 4 Million active profiles at any point in time.  Ezhava Matrimony App is designed keeping in mind various partner preferences, that a bride or groom might have while choosing their life partner.  Pelli, Maduve, Kalyanam, Vivah, Shaadi, or Vyah? EzhavaMatrimony helps you find your life partner. Thousands of Ezhavas from across Kerala, Tamil Nadu, and Karnataka in India and the world have found their perfect life partner here.  What are you waiting for still? Download the Ezhava Matrimony App Now and find your perfect life partner! Register FREE.
